snippet: Eusébio, a Portuguese soccer star of the 1960s and 1970s, died on Sunday at the age of 71.
abstract: Rob Hughes On Soccer column memorializes Eusebio, African-born soccer star of the 1960s and 1970s who was the finest player fielded by Portugal in his generation.
lead_paragraph: Eusébio, a Portuguese soccer star of the 1960s and 1970s, died on Sunday at the age of 71.

headline.main: Eusébio, 71, Legend of Portuguese Soccer, Dies
headline.print_headline: An All-World Talent and a Rarer Spirit Who Savored His Era
